home.title: I'm a developer passionate about creating elegant digital experiences
home.intro: I focus on building high-performance, accessible web applications. My work spans frontend development, user experience design, and system architecture, dedicated to combining thoughtfully designed interfaces with robust engineering practices.
home.currentWorkDescription: Responsible for building and maintaining the frontend architecture of core products at an innovative tech company, focusing on performance optimization and user experience improvements. Working closely with cross-functional teams to implement best practices.
home.aboutMeText1: Over the past few years, I've had the opportunity to work at companies of various sizesâ€”from startups to large enterprises. These experiences have taught me how to maintain code quality in rapidly changing environments and how to collaborate effectively within teams.
home.aboutMeText2: In my free time, I enjoy reading technical blogs, contributing to open-source projects, and exploring new technology stacks. I believe continuous learning is key to staying competitive.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Sharing my thoughts and experiences in web development, technical architecture, and engineering practices
